name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
